detectors.description: Presale.buyTokens(address) (contractSource/scsc/MXToken_crowdsale.sol#264-276) ignores return value by token.mint(contributor,amount) (contractSource/scsc/MXToken_crowdsale.sol#272)

Reentrancy in Presale.buyTokens(address) (contractSource/scsc/MXToken_crowdsale.sol#264-276):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)((token.totalSupply() + amount) <= maximumCap) (contractSource/scsc/MXToken_crowdsale.sol#269)
	- token.mint(contributor,amount) (contractSource/scsc/MXToken_crowdsale.sol#272)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- TokenPurchase(0x0,contributor,msg.value,amount) (contractSource/scsc/MXToken_crowdsale.sol#273)
	- Transfer(0x0,contributor,amount) (contractSource/scsc/MXToken_crowdsale.sol#274)
